title: Jacob Knyspel
text:
Hi! üëã I‚Äôm a PhD student at King‚Äôs College London, funded by a studentship from the KCL MRC DTP. My area of research is the genetics of PTSD. I‚Äôm especially interested in exploring the relationship between genetics, specific traumatic experiences and specific PTSD symptoms. In my research I use a combination of genomic and family-based methods.
Alongside my studies I work as a graduate teaching assistant at King‚Äôs College London and as a tutor for The Brilliant Club.
